io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util

Class MdcInstrumenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util.MdcInstrumenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvocationInstrumenterFactory, ReactiveInvocationInstrumenterFactory

    @Singleton
 @Requires(classes=org.slf4j.MDC.class)
 @Internal
public final class MdcInstrumenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements InvocationInstrumenterFactory, ReactiveInvocationInstrumenterFactory
    A function that instruments invocations with the Mapped Diagnostic Context for Slf4j.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher, LarsEckart
